TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi RibbonSplitButton extends System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonMenuButton implements class System.Windows.Input.ICommandSource
Public Class RibbonSplitButton Inherits RibbonMenuButton Implements ICommandSource

summary.span: 表示组合框，该组合框具有响应 事件的主按钮与显示互斥独占值的下拉列表的辅助按钮。

span.span: Represents a composite control that has a primary button that responds to a event and a secondary button that displays a drop-down list of mutually exclusive values.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下图显示的示例控件大、 中和小型变体，并且具有任何映像。The following illustration shows examples of controls in large, medium, and small variations, and with no images. ![功能区拆分按钮控件](~/add/media/wpfribbon-splitbutton.png "功能区拆分按钮控件")![Ribbon split button controls](~/add/media/wpfribbon-splitbutton.png "Ribbon split button controls") 功能区拆分按钮控件Ribbon split button controls 如下图所示控制打开下拉列表时。The following illustrations show controls when the drop-down is opened. ![功能区拆分按钮控件垂直-下打开](~/add/media/wpfribbon-splitbutton-selection.png "功能区拆分按钮控件带有打开的下拉列表")![Ribbon split button control with drop-down open](~/add/media/wpfribbon-splitbutton-selection.png "Ribbon split button control with drop-down open") 带有打开的下拉菜单的功能区拆分按钮控件Ribbon split button control with drop-down open ![功能区拆分按钮控件垂直-下打开](~/add/media/wpfribbon-splitbutton-selection2.png "功能区拆分按钮控件带有打开的下拉列表")![Ribbon split button control with drop-down open](~/add/media/wpfribbon-splitbutton-selection2.png "Ribbon split button control with drop-down open") 带有打开的下拉菜单的功能区拆分按钮控件Ribbon split button control with drop-down open ## Examples 下面的示例演示用于创建具有三个可用项的拆分按钮的标记。The following example shows the markup to create a split button with three available items. [!code-xaml[Ribbon_ControlsSample#RibbonSplitButton](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ribbon_controlssample/cs/mainwindow.xaml#ribbonsplitbutton)]

value.span: 有关什么可以影响值的详细信息，请参阅[依赖项属性值优先级](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/dependency-property-value-precedence.md)。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 快捷键提示必须介于 1 到 3 个大写字符，并且必须包含空格、 制表符或换行字符。A KeyTip must be from 1 to 3 uppercase characters, and must not contain spaces, tabs, or newline characters. 键提示有时也称为访问密钥或快捷键，可用作激活控件的快捷组合键。KeyTips are sometimes known as access keys or accelerators and are used as shortcut key combinations that activate controls. 键提示上显示当你按 ALT 键。KeyTips appear on the when you press the ALT key. ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|无None|

remarks.format: ## Remarks 每当应用程序代码或内部进程（如重新生成布局处理过程）调用 方法时，均会调用此方法。This method is invoked whenever application code or an internal process, such as a rebuilding layout pass, calls the method.
